title: Odom's Kids & Family Are Now By His Side in Vegas Hospital
text: Lamar Odom ‘s two children and his ex have joined Khloe Kardashian and her family at his hospital room – US Weekly Big American Horror Story: Hotel news! – TMZ Taylor Swift talks about finding happiness – Just Jared Jr Vin Diesel shares an adorable text from his daughter – Entertainment Weekly Is Brie Larson the [...] »
